actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to require that the date of publication of any material printed by the Government Printing Office, or of any material authorized to printed under chapter 5 of that title, appear on the first page of the material.

summary.text: Requires that the date of publication of any material printed by the Government Printing Office shall appear on the first page of the material.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to require that the date of publication of any material printed by the Government Printing Office, or of any material authorized to printed under chapter 5 of that title, appear on the first page of the material.
